label.name: WELCOME to Explicit Instruction for Adult Learners...
label.intro:
WELCOME to Explicit Instruction for Adult Learners

TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS: To be successful in this course, you will need:

  • The use of a standard desktop or laptop computer is strongly recommended. Access via tablet or smartphone may be problematic.
  • Reliable broadband internet access via a standard, up-to-date web browser.
  • An up-to-date version of Adobe Acrobat Reader.
    (use this link to update - *CAUTION: be sure to review/uncheck optional offers)
  • Software and settings that allow you to view and hear online video (audio/video transcripts are provided).
  • You may also need: browser settings that allow downloads as well as pages or documents to open in a new tab or window, the ability to save to a local computer or portable media, and/or access to a printer.

Click on the GETTING STARTED link below
for important information about course logistics and navigation.
